text: Hey all, and particularly <@U02F8LF2X> - can we pull central offline? Is there anything attached to it directly that I'm not thinking about?
backup hp inkjet printer... not exactly a precious commodity
<#C02GBEYBL> may need that connected at some point (when we're testing Photogram), but no rush--not today at least
<@U02618EV1> does that 3d-gopro rig have an internet presence yet? or is it still super prototype?
Actually, other than having used it a couple of times I'm not very familiar with the 3d-gopro at all.
So I don't know.
ok. I'm curious to see if we can pair it with these 3d microphones <http://www.hookeaudio.com/#3daudio>

attachments.title: Hooke
attachments.text: Wireless headphones that provide superior sound and capture 3D Audio.

text: bonus points if the person receiving the 3d video/audio stream is wearing an Oculus!
if SeeSay could use all that hardware, it might be an actually interesting app idea
there are also inroads with Skype here...

My friends at Happy Finish just finished the first commercial application of Google Cardboard for Ted Baker. Kinda neat <http://www.happyfinish.com/en/portfolio-archive/ted-baker-making-360-experience/>
<!channel> Does anyone know where the touchscreen Windows PC is?
<@U02HCCTFL>: That's really cool.

<@U026NB2U2>: they are doing more and more in the VR/AR space lately. They made this app with Space for Lufthansa to show off their new "premium economy" seats <http://us2.campaign-archive2.com/?u=3595636e9332d7d668625b8d5&id=500a55112d>

<@U02HCCTFL>: I can see an immediate application for theatre seat selection. it's available now as a browser-based panorama, but getting a VR experience for both sitting and standing at a specific location would be amazing
though the data collection task for a 5K-seat auditorium would make it cost-prohibitive...
quadracopter w/ gps could do the data collection
as could a Roomba with a mast cam
basically at seated eye-level
added bonus: can search for loose change under the seats and generate additional revenue :simple_smile:
